mapper.select: SELECT kb.id, kb.name, kb.description, kb.creator_id, u.nickname as creator_name, kb.status, kb.create_time, kb.update_time, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM kb_document WHERE kb_id = kb.id AND deleted = 0) as document_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM kb_category WHERE kb_id = kb.id AND deleted = 0) as category_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM kb_tag WHERE kb_id = kb.id AND deleted = 0) as tag_count FROM kb_knowledge_base kb LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON kb.creator_id = u.id kb.deleted = 0 AND kb.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND kb.creator_id = #{creatorId} AND kb.status = #{status} ORDER BY kb.create_time DESC

SELECT kb.id, kb.name, kb.description, kb.creator_id, u.nickname as creator_name, kb.status, kb.create_time, kb.update_time, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM kb_document WHERE kb_id = kb.id AND deleted = 0) as document_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM kb_category WHERE kb_id = kb.id AND deleted = 0) as category_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM kb_tag WHERE kb_id = kb.id AND deleted = 0) as tag_count FROM kb_knowledge_base kb LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON kb.creator_id = u.id WHERE kb.id = #{id} AND kb.deleted = 0

SELECT DISTINCT kb.id, kb.name, kb.description, kb.creator_id, u.nickname as creator_name, kb.status, kb.create_time, kb.update_time, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM kb_document WHERE kb_id = kb.id AND deleted = 0) as document_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM kb_category WHERE kb_id = kb.id AND deleted = 0) as category_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM kb_tag WHERE kb_id = kb.id AND deleted = 0) as tag_count FROM kb_knowledge_base kb LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON kb.creator_id = u.id LEFT JOIN kb_knowledge_base_permission kbp ON kb.id = kbp.kb_id WHERE kb.deleted = 0 AND ( kb.creator_id = #{userId} OR kbp.user_id = #{userId} OR kbp.role_id IN ( SELECT role_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE user_id = #{userId} ) ) ORDER BY kb.create_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM kb_document WHERE kb_id = #{kbId} AND deleted = 0
